metadata.name: MedBank
metadata.description: Medical question bank and study platform with author portal, student dashboard, and real-time analytics

summary.purpose: MedBank is a comprehensive medical education platform featuring: - Multi-product question bank system with role-based access - Author portal for content creation and governance - Student dashboard with performance analytics and test creation - Real-time database with SQLite backend (better-sqlite3) - Full product isolation and subscription management - Governance workflows for question approval/publishing
summary.keyFeatures: - Product-scoped questions and subscriptions - Role-based access control (admin, author, student) - Question lifecycle management (draft → review → approved → published) - Test assembly engine with dynamic question pooling - Student performance tracking with cognition analysis - Author analytics and universe statistics - Subscription and purchase management - Real-time notifications
summary.architecture: - Frontend: Next.js 16.1.1 with React 19.2.3 - Backend: Next.js API routes (full-stack) - Database: SQLite with better-sqlite3 - Styling: Tailwind CSS 4 + Framer Motion animations - Icons: Lucide React - Charts: Recharts

authentication.description: User authentication with email/password and role-based access
authentication.roles: - admin: Full system access - author: Content creation and management - student: Question bank access and testing

questionManagement.description: Complete question lifecycle management with governance
questionManagement.features: - Question creation with metadata (system, subject, topic) - Multiple choice with single/multiple correct answers - Image support in stems, options, and explanations - Governance workflow (draft → review → approved → published) - Version tracking and history - Product-scoped question pools - Question statistics and performance tracking

examEngine.description: Comprehensive test/exam creation and execution engine
examEngine.features: - Dynamic question pooling with filtering (subject, system, status) - Test assembly with configurable question count and mode - Real-time exam interface with navigation - Timer management with auto-submit - Answer tracking and flagging - Performance scoring with immediate feedback - Session snapshots for forensics

productManagement.description: Multi-product system with subscription and access control
productManagement.features: - Product creation and publication - Product-scoped question pools - Subscription and pricing management - Product marketplace for students - Author universe analytics per product - Product isolation for data security

subscriptionSystem.features: - Multiple subscription packages (90, 180, 365 days) - Purchase workflow with cart system - Subscription activation and renewal - Trial periods - Subscription tracking and management

analytics.features: - Student performance tracking - Question statistics and difficulty analysis - Engagement metrics - Cognition-based readiness assessment - Author universe analytics - Global platform statistics

userInterface.description: Modern, responsive UI with dark mode support
userInterface.technologies: - Tailwind CSS 4 for styling - Framer Motion for animations - Lucide React for icons - Recharts for data visualization
userInterface.features: - Author portal dashboard - Student learning dashboard - Real-time exam interface - Analytics visualizations - Mobile-responsive design - Dark/light theme support

keyFeatures.feature: Products act as content containers with their own question pools, subscriptions, and analytics. Full data isolation between products.
Complete lifecycle: Draft → Submit for Review → Approved → Published/Deprecated. Version tracking and approval workflows.
Dynamic question pooling with filtering by system, subject, topic, difficulty. Smart randomization for test variety.
Full-featured exam interface with timer, question navigation, flagging, and instant performance feedback.
Analyzes student behavior to assess readiness and predict performance. Session analysis for learning patterns.
Complete authoring experience with question management, product oversight, universe analytics, and user management.
Comprehensive performance analytics, question attempt history, test results, and learning curve visualization.
Three-tier system (admin, author, student) with appropriate permissions and features for each role.

stateManagement.description: Context API for global state, localStorage for persistence
stateManagement.appContext: - currentUser (authentication state) - theme (dark/light mode) - cart (shopping cart items) - notifications - products (marketplace data) - userSubscriptions
stateManagement.examContext: - currentQuestionIndex - answers (user selections) - flagged (marked questions) - timeRemaining - sessionId (for forensics)
stateManagement.localStorage: - medbank_user (current user ID) - medbank-author-unlocked (author mode flag) - medbank_author_product_context (selected product for authors) - medbank_focused_product (student's current product) - medbank_theme (user's theme preference)

performanceOptimizations.optimization: Next.js 16.1.1 with App Router for efficient server-side rendering
SQLite with WAL mode for concurrent access

Efficient query patterns for product-scoped data
